ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen California mixed vegetables (cauliflower, broccoli, and carrots)
1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed

cookingTips: Make a roux with butter and flour before adding milk to prevent lumps in the soup
Add frozen vegetables directly without thawing for best texture
Cube the cheese food before adding so it melts smoothly into the soup
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook the roux technique for creating a creamy base, and emphasize the importance of whisking constantly to avoid lumps when adding milk.
